description:
As climate hysteria peaks, Dr Jessica Weinkle tells Freedom Research's Hannes Sarv that cutting through the media frenzy is crucial for accurately interpreting extreme weather and rising disaster costs.

The post Why Rising Disaster Costs Aren’t Proof of Climate Chaos appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Rising Disaster Costs Aren’t Proof of Climate Chaos

description:
Labour is accused of being in thrall to the unions after ministers accepted over £480,000 in donations, before handing out inflation-busting public sector pay rises.

The post Cabinet Ministers Accepted Hundreds of Thousands in Union Donations Before Striking Pay Deals appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Cabinet Ministers Accepted Hundreds of Thousands in Union Donations Before Striking Pay Deals

description:
In a summary of his excellent new book, Return to Growth, Jon Moynihan argues that the UK's economic growth has been suffocated by a bloated public sector, punitively high taxes and too much red tape.

The post How to Save Britain From a Doom Loop of Decay, Decline – and Default appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: How to Save Britain From a Doom Loop of Decay, Decline – and Default

description:
Despite severe financial struggles across the university sector, over two-thirds of vice-chancellors at cash-strapped institutions enjoyed significant pay rises last year, including some with increases of up to 26%.

The post Outrage As Two Thirds of Vice Chancellors at Cash Cutting Universities Are Revealed to Have Taken Pay Rises appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Outrage As Two Thirds of Vice Chancellors at Cash Cutting Universities Are Revealed to Have Taken Pay Rises

description:
The Health Ombudsman has submitted evidence to an investigation into the NHS arguing that the veneration of the service as a 'national religion' has protected it from criticisms that it needs to hear and should respond to.

The post Clapping For NHS May Have Shielded it From Necessary Criticism, Health Watchdog Warns appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Clapping For NHS May Have Shielded it From Necessary Criticism, Health Watchdog Warns

description:
According to the latest climate scare, burning hydrocarbons has caused a surge in child marriages in Pakistan. Absolute nonsense, says Chris Morrison, Environment Editor of the Daily Sceptic.

The post Lock Up Your Daughters! Climate Change Causes Rise in Child Marriages appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lock Up Your Daughters! Climate Change Causes Rise in Child Marriages
